sentences.sContent: Fractured zone has a crudity surface with a pitch.
sentences.sContent_eng: Fractured zone has a crudity surface with a pitch.
sentences.sCn: 断裂带表面粗糙，并带有斜度。

sentences.sContent: She has revealed the truth of the common marriage: helplessness and endurance, crudity and warmth.
sentences.sContent_eng: She has revealed the truth of the common marriage: helplessness and endurance, crudity and warmth.
sentences.sCn: 她写出了普通人婚姻的真谛： 无奈与忍耐， 粗糙中温情洋溢。

words.tran: 粗糙的；天然的，未加工的；粗鲁的
粗糙地；天然地；粗鲁地；不成熟地
渣滓；脏家伙；搀和物；杂质
